content: I won't be able to make it to the meetings today. Sorry.
I've marked https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/91991 as P-high btw.
Do we have generated versions of the agendas?
I won't be able to make the libs meeting, but I can join the libs-api meeting afterwards.
Do we have enough on the agenda to motivate a libs-api meeting, given the proximity to the holiday?
I could use some next steps for the Instant topic.
But if everyone already is in vacation mode it can also wait.
@The 8472 Based on the poll we did on Zulip, I think we might have near-consensus on "just unconditionally saturate".
Ok, I can do that. But I'll be grumbly when it gets relitigated again after I have changed it for the 3rd time or so.
I'm going to start an MCP for that on the issue, so that we confirm that consensus.
FCP or MCP?
Er, yes. FCP. :)

Summary: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/89926#issuecomment-999821396
rfcbot checklist: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/89926#issuecomment-999821427

As an aside, one of the options discussed in the meeting was "what if we made Duration signed", and if we had it to do over again, I think that might have been the right answer. Then we'd have to address things like "what if you try to sleep for a negative Duration", but I think those questions have simpler answers.
I think that'd be a much larger change, though, and one that'd need heavy effort to migrate to.
@T-libs-api meeting time
Brt
Would someone mind running the agenda generator and sticking the result on the team hackmd?
can do
Agenda: https://hackmd.io/@rust-libs/ByQmHbbjF
